ch0004_10_toko/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you made it!
I’m all ready to go!
ch0004_10_toko/0101_0701_02_10:
Today, we’re gonna have the most intense battles
Pasio has ever seen!
ch0004_10_toko/7101_0701_01_10:
Victini is the Victory Pokémon! It’s perfect for me
since I love battling so much!
ch0004_10_toko/7101_0701_02_10:
But actually, I’m trying to be the one to give Victini
the present of victory!
ch0004_10_toko/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s what’s on my mind when we’re
battling together.
ch0004_10_toko/7102_0701_01_10:
I think it’s important to try everything—not just
in battles but in anything you do!
ch0004_10_toko/7102_0701_02_10:
I’ve tried out the Pasio food-fighting challenge,
the Pasio cold-endurance challenge,
the Pasio speed-walking challenge...
ch0004_10_toko/7102_0701_03_10:
I’ll give anything a go! I was surrounded by really
strong rivals at each competition, but one day, I’ll
get my rematch and win them all!
ch0004_10_toko/7103_0701_01_10:
So, what do you think of this sygna suit? It
matches Victini!
ch0004_10_toko/7103_0701_02_10:
Whenever I wear it, I can’t wait to find someone
to battle!
ch0004_10_toko/7103_0701_03_10:
Oh, I was always like that? I guess you have
a point!
ch0004_10_toko/7104_0701_01_10:
All in all, it seems I’m most compatible with
Fire-type Pokémon.
ch0004_10_toko/7104_0701_02_10:
That doesn’t mean I only use Fire types, but
everything just seems to click when I’m paired
with them!
ch0004_10_toko/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Do you have
anyone you really don’t wanna lose to?
ch0004_10_toko/7105_0701_02_10:
For me, it’s everyone! Though lately, I guess it’s
you in particular, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0004_10_toko/7105_0701_03_10:
Now that we’re even better friends, I feel like I
understand you better.
ch0004_10_toko/7105_0701_04_10:
I know how strong you are, so that’s probably
why I don’t want to lose to you!
ch0004_10_toko/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Here, take this! It’s for you!
ch0004_10_toko/1701_0702_01_10:
Victini found it, so maybe it has the power to
bring you victory!
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0701_01_10:
You know how you can make a V sign with
your fingers?
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0701_02_10:
I think people saw Victini doing that pose and
started copying it!
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0701_03_10:
I think it’s a pretty valid theory...but what do
you think?
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0702_01_10: Victory starts with a V! Cool pose, right?
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0702_02_10: Do you have a cool victory pose, too?
ch0004_10_toko/2501_0702_03_10:
If you strike your favorite pose with your partner
Pokémon, it really pumps you up!
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0701_01_10:
Ever since I paired up with Victini, I started
thinking about what it means to win.
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0701_02_10: I don’t really have a solid answer yet, but...
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0701_03_10:
I think what you do to win is more important than
actually winning.
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0702_01_10:
Whether you win or lose, everything you did along
the way builds up and doesn’t change.
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0702_02_10: Calling it a win or a loss is just labeling a result.
ch0004_10_toko/2511_0702_03_10:
Well... Even if it’s just a result, I really don’t
wanna lose!
ch0004_10_toko/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! C’mon, let’s get battling already!
ch0004_10_toko/3003_0701_01_10: Hey. Wanna team up for a few battles today?
ch0004_10_toko/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh! Is it dark already?! But I’ve still got so much
I wanna do today!
